FuncDef: This command configures the APN-Aggregate-Max-Bitrate-DL AVP. When enabled, the AVP is interpreted as a rate override for the specified egress QoS object. For queues and policers, the PIR is overridden.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to map to an aggregate rate.
Specifies the name of the arbiter to be overridden.
Specifies to map to an HS SLA aggregate rate.
Specifies the ID of the policer to be overridden.
Specifies the ID of the queue to be overridden.
Specifies the name of the scheduler to be overridden.
